tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Mumford & Sons - I Will Wait (Official Audio)
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: 'I Will Wait' taken from the new album 'Babel' released on Sep 24th 2012. Pre-order now at www.mumfordandsons.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: because they﻿ are about the person and not the music
*in passing﻿
addicted. ﻿
I see that 660 people﻿ prefer the tunes of Justin bieber
Oh Mumford & Sons, how we have missed﻿ you.
I like the part﻿ with the road..
Me too! (birthday﻿ not bootcamp)

you know,﻿ i used to kinda hate this song 'cause i was so used to how nothing is written sounds and i thought it sounded wrong, but over time i've actually started to listen to this song more often, and i've fallen in love with it =D
I love this song. its pretty cute﻿ :)
Dead squirel at 3:21﻿
How could anyone dislike this song??﻿ Are they deaf??
I can click it, but I will dislike it.﻿
just realized that this releases on my birthday... too﻿ bad I'll be in boot camp for my b-day
this song﻿ is great!

I have now completed seventeen thousand miles since first listening to this great song. But I have to admit it﻿ is costing me a fortune in tyres and petrol. I have got to eat and drink something though?
Yes, because every one with a video cam never did something like this before ._.﻿
weirdos are the ones that look up songs they﻿ dont like. ur a douchebag. get a job troll.
Bit﻿ of top comment rage there?
We﻿ got a badass ova here.
Be my friend, please? You sound awesome.﻿ LOL
Absolutely﻿ LOVE thier music! :) For ever! :) fabulous! :)
Nobody's going to miss your﻿ pseudocultural ass at your minimum wage deadbeat job anyway.
My orthodontist recommended﻿ this song to me aha =D
This songs words speak more than a video would ever would. This song explains a lot of things I'm going threw in life....death, and a﻿ love I lost but a love I can't walk away from.

I heard this is passing at a friend's house on the﻿ radio, and I was immediately overwhelmed. Truly one of the prettiest songs I have ever had the pleasure of listening to. Just a subtle touch of melancholy and longing in those harmonies, so powerful

Reviewer.Books: Wide awake in dreamland is a nightmare for non believers
Reviewer.Company: Seller of Souls and Black Holes
Reviewer.Movies: I watch them, watching me, watching them, watching me.
Reviewer.Music: I cant dance and I cant sing,I aint no good for a god damn thing

Reviewer.Movies: Big Lebowski, Demolition Man, The Medallion, Rambo 4, Pearl Harbor, Terminator series, Step by Step sitcom, Superstar...
Reviewer.School: Secondary Medical School of Stefan Klubert, Levoča, Catholic University Ružomberok, SVK,
